entry.title: Bodyguards
entry.summary: EXECUTIVE SECURITY SERVICES Depending on your profession or lifestyle, some everyday situations may not be entirely risk-free, regardless of if the threat is opportunistic…
entry.content:
EXECUTIVE SECURITY SERVICES

Depending on your profession or lifestyle, some everyday situations may not be entirely risk-free, regardless of if the threat is opportunistic or planned. Incidents that affect personal safety, both indirectly or directly, can and do occur each day. From government officials, executives, VIPs, celebrities and others who are seeking protective services, Securivex’s executive protection can be deployed as teams or individuals to provide you with the executive protection necessary for your well-being and peace of mind.

Personal Bodyguard Protection Services

If you’re a VIP, executive, celebrity, rapper, artist, politician, banker or just looking for personal protection and are looking to hire a bodyguard, Securivex Service offers the expertise you can trust. Some of the world’s rich and famous trust our bodyguards to keep them safe. protection can be deployed as teams or individuals to provide you with the executive protection necessary for your well-being and peace of mind.we are trained experts in private security, being able to provide staff for, private vip transportation, private security for executives, celebrities and even personal concierge services which require discreet operations by trained professionals.

entry.title: Surveillance
entry.summary: PRIVATE INVESTIGATOR SERVICES We understand that when you hire a private investigator, it is because you are seeking answers. While we go about our…
entry.content:
PRIVATE INVESTIGATOR SERVICES

We understand that when you hire a private investigator, it is because you are seeking answers. While we go about our job to help you find these answers, we will keep the information and our efforts quiet. We remain professional, discreet and cordial throughout the process, ensuring the results of what we find exceed your expectations. You can have confidence that we will leave no stone unturned when it comes to helping you get the answers you need to go on with your life.

Our team is dedicated to helping you find the information you need to prove a legal case, find a missing person or handle other issues you are facing. Some of the specific services that are offered including:

  • Adultery
  • Infidelity
  • Surveillance
  • Finding missing persons
  • Fraud investigations
  • Deep research
  • Background checks
  • Online dating
  • Infidelity
  • Child custody
  • Divorce Support
  • Forensic Recovery Services

SECURITY CCTV CAMERA

With Securivex you don’t have to let thieves, shoplifters or anyone else destroy your store, cost you money during the busy season, or result in you having to close your doors. By hiring Securivex, you can prevent direct loss. The team can help protect your store while teaching your work staff how to ensure theft doesn’t affect the business. 

Securivex can provide help with all the following to prevent trade loss  & theft:

  • Wireless Security Camera Installation
  • Home Alarm Systems & CCTV
  • Business Alarm Systems & CCTV
  • Smart Phone Compatible Camera Systems
  • Remote CCTV Monitoring and Response
  • 24/7 Control Room Monitoring
  • Rapid Incident Response

entry.title: Security Audit & Partnerships
entry.summary: Allign with best security standards A Company in Security, Corporate Investigation, Cyber Security and other Service provisions, covering the diverse subjects of the various…
entry.content:
Allign with best security standards

A Company in Security, Corporate Investigation, Cyber Security and other Service provisions, covering the diverse subjects of the various amalgamates of Security are looking for a tie up in various states of India, with established Private Security Agencies run by only Ex-Defence officers for colaboration in its operations nationaly and internationally. The most important thing for any security business is presence of demand of service. The Company has multiple demand generation channels spread across the country in private and government sectors.The Company also keeps on innovating their strategies to attract a high number of demand of security services while maintaining the dignity of the Ex-Defence Officers running the Private Security Agencies so that the Veteran Officers are not harassed in looking for work.
The moment a Security Company gets on board with the company, the company will assist in standardising and upgrading the service to match the INDUSTRY standards set by the company, which will result in Security agencies getting a top-notch transformation in compliance with the best of security standards.The Company also provide inputs on staff training and on delivering processes, for maximum impact.
The Company invites interest from all such private Security Agencies in receipt of statutory licences on a pan India basis to align with us and grow together.The Company aim is to build long-term partnership with the end goal of delivering value to the clients. We seek expression of interest from interested patrons to work out mutual modalities of interest.

entry.title: Services
entry.summary: Commercial Security Services Modern businesses face an ever growing assortment of security and safety concerns. We understand that the need for industrial and business security…
entry.content:
Commercial Security Services

Modern businesses face an ever growing assortment of security and safety concerns. We understand that the need for industrial and business security guards is increasing throughout the nation. In many cases, the only option is to contact private commercial security contractors with the proper experience and expertise to protect the business accurately.

At Securivex, we provide an array of customized commercial security solutions for several issues, including monitoring and alarm verification, access control, safety, vandalism and loss prevention. Our goal is to help keep your business protected 24 hours a day.

LOSS PREVENTION SERVICES

Shoplifting and in store theft are serious issues that can not only affect a store’s bottom line, but can eventually put a store or retail outlet out of business if it is not properly addressed. One of the main areas where our trained guards shine is in providing retail loss prevention services.

By hiring Securivex, you can prevent direct loss. The team can help protect your store while teaching your work staff how to ensure theft doesn’t affect the business.

HOSPITAL SECURITY SERVICES

Hospital security requires a sharp eye and even a more intelligent mind. Entry doors that emit patients, private patient rooms, and even supply closets may become the target of unauthorized personnel. While the protection and respect of the staff and patients are always a top priority, hospital security also demands that we identify suspicious behaviors and details when they occur. Our well-trained, professional security guards, many of whom are former military or law enforcement have the proper training to assess risk, behavior, people, and more to provide you, your staff and your patients with the peace of mind necessary to handle important tasks.

Hotel Security Guard Services

Hotel security requires a sharp mind and an even sharper eye. The entry doors that are kept unlocked to welcome guests can also welcome uninvited visitors. While respect and protection of your guests is always a priority, hotel security also requires being able to identify behaviors and other details that reveal if someone is acting suspiciously. Our highly-trained hotel security guards, many of whom are former law enforcement or military, are well trained in assessing risk, people, behavior and more.

Construction Site Security Services

Ensuring your construction site is protected around the clock is vital to any projects success, especially large ones. After all, you likely leave equipment out that is susceptible to theft or damage, and expensive materials that can’t be stored in a warehouse day after day. There’s also the threat of property damage from ignorant individuals, as well as the threat of damage due to severe weather or other natural occurrences. Regardless of how you look at it, construction sites are vulnerable.

That is why investing in quality construction site security guards is so important. Our on-site security services provide around the clock monitoring of your site to ensure no significant losses occur.

Event Security Services

At Securivex, we understand the importance of providing a safe and secure environment for holding your concert, trade shows or special event. Our expert security consultants have years of experience and training in the most efficient techniques of crowd management and venue security.

We work in close collaboration with promoters and venues to give coverage of all aspects of the event. From gate attendants to traffic control, to crowd management, our goal is to ensure that your event runs smoothly and without incident.

 

 

What We offer

Event Staffing services as well as crowd management, post event trash pick-up. If you find yourself needing the most comprehensive security professionals around, contact us.

Concert Security

  • Beach Party Security
  • Ultra Festival Security
  • Rock Concert Security

Event Ushers

  • VIP Parties
  • Ultra Festival Security
  • High End Office Parties
  • Reunions
  • Charity Parties
  • Wedding Receptions
  • Bachelor Parties

Trade Shows

  • Auto Expo
  • Art & Craft Trade Shows
  • Food & Wine Festival
 

BUSINESS SECURITY SERVICES YOU CAN TRUST

We understand that the need for domestic, industrial and business security guards is increasing throughout the nation. In many cases, the only option is to contact private commercial security contractors with the proper experience and expertise to protect the business accurately.

From complete access control development to loss prevention training and integration, Securivex can provide the services and security your business needs. While we serve any commercial property in need, our commercial security guards also specialize in niche protection, including security for building front lobbies, construction site security, nightclub security consulting, front gate security, local security and more.

entry.title: Special Event Security Guards
entry.summary: Special Event Security Guards Toronto Event Security: Today public gatherings require a high level of security protection in light of the growing threat of…
entry.content:
Special Event Security Guards

Toronto Event Security: Today public gatherings require a high level of security protection in light of the growing threat of terror and criminal activity.

 
 

Northern Force Security provides security and protection services to a variety of events from small private events to large, full service events such as concerts, festivals, community, sports and cultural events.

 

Full Threat & Risk Assessment

Northern Force Security’s team of professionally trained security experts will come to your location to assess your security needs and provide you with tailored security solutions that will meet all security and safety requirements and keep your event secure and harmless.

 

Access Control

Events are usually crowded by high numbers of visitors, guests and support personnel. Criminals and terrorists may attempt to enter your event and cause irreparable damage to attendees. Northern Force Security professionals are trained to identify such individuals and threats and alert police and fire departments, thus preventing crime and violence.

 

Emergency Response

In the event of an emergency your guests and stuff need to be evacuated in a most efficient manner in order to prevent loss of life, or personal injury. Northern Force Security experts will assess the vulnerable spots of your event and create emergency response protocols in order to prevent from potential harm, injury and possible lawsuits.

 

Crowd Control

Your business must be prepared to cope with a variety of security related issues and unexpected situations that may damage your professional reputation. Northern Force Security professional consultants are focused on providing you with the right approach and advise in order to prepare you and your staff for the most efficient crisis management.

entry.title: Executive and VIP Protection
entry.summary: Executive and VIP Protection Bodyguard Services Hire Executive and VIP Protection Bodyguard Services. Distinguished people require constant security service in order to maintain their…
entry.content:
Executive and VIP Protection Bodyguard Services

Hire Executive and VIP Protection Bodyguard Services. Distinguished people require constant security service in order to maintain their privacy and protect their reputation.

 
 

Northern Force Security provides the following Executive and VIP security services for private and public individuals.

 

Escort

You may feel safe and secure while you are on your way to a shareholders meeting, corporate event, trade show or personal matter. However, you may be followed or watched and your privacy and security may be put at risk. Northern Force Security professional escort guards are trained to make your route safe and secure.

 

Safe route

Your transportation and travel itinerary must be thoroughly planned and designed in order to maintain the highest level of individual security. Your driver may be the most experienced in different traffic situations but your journey must be safe and planned. Northern Force Security professional experts will provide you with safe route planning ensuring your safety and privacy is a top priority.

 

Inspection and examination

Your destination must be thoroughly examined before your arrival in order to prevent potential risk to your safety and to maintain your privacy and security. Northern Force Security professional experts will inspect all vulnerable spots as part of our VIP/Executive services so as to allow you to focus on your priorities.

 

Drivers

Your driver is undoubtedly a great asset. There are situations however, when you require a higher level of professional drivers services. Northern Force Security’s professional drivers will transport you in a safe and secure manner paying increased attention to all threatening situations. Our drivers are available on a full-time or occasional basis.
